title: Is it possible to write an authentic POC main character if you're a cis white person? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write whatever you want. Serious writers research EVERYTHING. I could write a story from the perspective of a butterfly even though I've never hung out with one. The difference in my ridiculous example and your semi-offensive question is that butterflies and humans aren't the same species; white people and black people are. However a similarity is that if butterflies could talk there would be a few who would judge your writing harshly because you're not and have never been a butterfly. Trust me, it will be the same with the humans. As long as you know this in advance, you will be fine.
Hard to say. Theoretically it should be. Depends a bit on what you mean by “authentic”, anyway. As in based on a real person? Believable in that setting? Believable in the real world?
